ComicInfo.Summary:
“Gauging the Truth,” Part Three! The Reversionists have a plan, a way to bring their world closer to purity and Primus. Arcee and Greenlight have a plan, to save the world from the Reversionist plan since it seems pretty drastic. Gauge has a decision to make: which side does she help?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Umi Miyao | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Sara Pitre-Durocher | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Kei Zama (a) & Josh Burcham (c) | 4 | Note: The digital edition (9/2/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.
